text: Ruins of Knockdavie Castle Knockdavie Castle is a now-ruined 17th-century house in Burntisland parish, Fife county, Scotland. ==External links== *ScotlandsPlaces.gov.uk * Knockdavie, Fife Place-name Data Category:Ruined castles in Fife Category:Listed castles in Scotland
title: Knockdavie Castle
